name: assignment
description: ## Requirements - Write code (preferably in JavaScript) to mint both a fungible token (token) and a non-fungible token (NFT). - The tokens should have names, symbols, descriptions, and images. - The token decimals should be set to 6. - The code should mint 100 tokens for yourself and 10 tokens for the address `63EEC9FfGyksm7PkVC6z8uAmqozbQcTzbkWJNsgqjkFs`. - All the above steps must be completed in a single transaction. - The NFT should also have a name, symbol, description, image, and additional traits. - The NFT royalty should be set to 10%. - Please include the signatures of your executed transactions run on devnet in your submission.
